summary: HEATER STOPPED WORKING-HEATER CORE CHECKED AND FOUND TO BE OKAY.  THERMASTAT REPLACED.  WATER PUMP FOUND TO BE NON-FUNCTIONAL AND REPLACED.  PROBLEM NOT SOLVED.  HEAD GASKETS REPLACED AND FOUND CRACKED HEAD.  HEAD REPLACED -S STILL DID NOT SOLVE THE HEAT PROBLEM.  HEATER CORE REPLACED-STILL DID NOT SOLVE THE PROBLEM.  RADIATOR REPLACED - PROBLEM APPEARS TO BE SOLVED, HOWEVER CAR RUNS WORSE THAN IT DID BEFORE SPENDING $3,500-.  TOTALL FRUSTRATED AND NO HELP FROM AUDI AFTER NUMEROUS PHONE CALLS.  CAR WARRANTY RAN OUT IN DECEMBER-PROBLEM OCCURED IN JANUARY.
